detail_desc: Top in ribbed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.

Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. One large outer compartment at the front and one inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 4.5x16.5x22 cm.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Short cycling shorts in stretch jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-in creases at the front and stirrups with adjustable fasteners.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

PREMIUM QUALITY. Premium cotton shirt with a tab and button grandad collar and French front. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved body in mesh with a turtle neck, lined front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Calf-length dress in organic silk with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gentle flare to the hem with a wide, asymmetric flounce. Unlined.
Multi-strand necklace of metal chains, two with pendants. Adjustable length 35-43 cm.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Boat-necked jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Bracelets in various designs. One elastic bracelet with wooden and metal beads, one elastic bracelet with metal beads, and one metal chain bracelet.

Dungaree shorts in organic cotton seersucker with a pocket at the top, straps with adjustable buttoning, and a button at the sides. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in soft, double-weave organic cotton with an elasticated, drawstring waist and elasticated hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small chest pocket.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and ribbing around the neckline.

Shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bracelets in various designs. Four elastic bracelets with beads and one in braided fabric with an adjustable length.
Metal rings in various designs.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, pleats at the front and detachable, soft tie belt. Fake fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Thong briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist and lined gusset.
Short top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and a smocked bodice. Shaped neckline, short sleeves with elastication at the top and bottom, and a seam and small frill trim at the hem.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems. Raw-edge hems.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in mesh embroidered with sequins. Opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Alice band covered in fabric containing glittery threads. Large bow on one side.
Short wrap dress in soft jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend with a V-neck and ties at one side. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with embroidery. V-neck, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short coat woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels and a concealed button at the front. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.
Satin shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and frill-trimmed hems.
Rope-braided Alice band in imitation leather with metal tips.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with wide shoulder straps, a low-cut back and padded cups.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Hat in a rib knit with faux fur pompoms on top and a turned-up hem.
Hat in thermal fleece with a contrasting colour trim at the hem.
Body in soft jersey with a draped, wrapover front and lined gusset with press-studs.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist and a zip at the back. Lined.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Low cut at the back, round, elastic shoulder straps, a lined gusset and a string back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in stretch, textured jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and decorative tie detail at one side.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.
Fitted lace body with a V-neck, long sleeves and a seam at the hips, below which is a jersey section with press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front and back.
Scarf in an airy, patterned cotton weave. Size 95x95 cm.

Jacket in soft, fast-drying thermal fleece with a high collar, concealed zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Hat in a printed weave with reflective details, a turned-up peak, earflaps and a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Lining in faux fur and fleece.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket and small text appliqué at the hem.

Sports trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped pockets in the side seams. Wide legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and press-studs that can be opened all the way down.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace-covered shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
V-neck top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Glittery, fabric-covered Alice band decorated with ears and a padded unicorn horn with a tulle frill at the base.
Top in cotton jersey with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a low, ribbed waistband and straight, wide legs.
Short shirt dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a pleat, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying mesh with a print motif on the front.

Padded jacket in a checked weave containing some wool with a pile collar and zip down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Underwired lace bras with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shirt in an airy linen weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved top in airy, ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar and straight-cut hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Lightweight joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Top in a crinkled viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top, both front and back.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with a high waist with concealed elastication and slim, extra-long legs with a concealed zip at the hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in patterned cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved dresses in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered, frilled seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
